respondent: Daniel Spagone, United States Navy Commander, Consolidated Naval Brig
lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit

wikiData.title: Al-Marri v. Spagone
wikiData.FullName: Ali Saleh Kahlah al-Marri, Petitioner v. Daniel Spagone, United States Navy Commander, Consolidated Naval Brig
wikiData.Prior: Writ of Certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit
wikiData.QuestionsPresented: Whether U.S. residents can be imprisoned indefinitely for suspected wrongdoing without being charged with a crime and tried before a jury.
